cause.description:
Camp Heartland is a national 501 (c) 3 that makes a profound and positive impact on the lives of children who experience HIV/AIDS, poverty, foster care, grief and other life challenges.
1. All people deserve to live with dignity and respect no matter their HIV status, economic status or background.
2. Until there is a real one, compassion is our only cure for HIV.
3. HIV is preventable but is spreading in young people aged 15-24 at alarming rates. Young people must educate each other to stay HIV negative!
cause.mission: Help children impacted by HIV and other troubling issues.
cause.name: Friends of Camp Heartland
